name: maxun
tagline: A self-hosted knowledge base built around structured context graphs
description: Maxun is a self-hosted personal knowledge base that organizes thoughts, notes, and bookmarks into a structured context graph. It features tagging, hierarchical navigation, and a minimal UI for modern workflows.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Apply multiple tags to items for flexible cross-referencing and filtering

features.title: Bookmark Management
features.description: Save and organize web links with automatic metadata extraction

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Capture thoughts and information with rich text formatting and Markdown support

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find any item quickly using full-text search across all content types

features.title: REST API
features.description: Rapidly add new items with keyboard shortcuts and browser extensions
